sec.p: For the synthesis of Cd-oleate solution a protocol by Li et al. ( 2011) was adopted. A 0.38 M Cd-oleate solution was made by dissolving 383 mg CdO in 3.9 ml oleic acid and 3.9 ml ODE at 280°C under N 2 flow. After 1 h the CdO was dissolved and the clear solution was degassed for 30 min at 110°C.
